name: Night Haven (Pr. 2)
description:
This is the second iteration of the game in development.  

Some implementations added:

- Open world Environment

- New Models made from Vroid Studio

- Character Selection

- level system

- Zoom in and out Scroll in game

- Boss fight ( PRESS the Alphabet 'O' key in Game scene)

- First Person Option ( PRESS the number '0' key in Game scene)

- New abilities: 

        "1" KEY: electric power

        "2" KEY: fire ball

       "3" KEY: Placeholder

       "4" KEY: Enhance power #1 and #2

       "Q" KEY: Charge Up

in Development by Jonathan Chen
